description: Tools for monitoring critical system components

tools.name: get_system_health_status
tools.description: Retrieves the current health status and operational state of all critical infrastructure systems including servers, databases, network components, and applications

include_metrics.description: Whether to include detailed performance metrics like CPU, memory, and disk usage

tools.name: get_active_alerts
tools.description: Fetches all active alerts and incidents from monitoring systems for critical infrastructure components

time_range.description: Time range for alert retrieval in hours

tools.name: check_service_availability
tools.description: Performs availability checks on critical services and applications to verify they are responding and accessible

service_group.description: Specific group of services to check

include_response_times.description: Whether to include response time measurements in the results

tools.name: get_infrastructure_summary
tools.description: Provides a high-level summary dashboard view of overall infrastructure status including capacity utilization and recent changes

include_capacity.description: Whether to include capacity utilization information for storage, compute, and network resources

include_recent_changes.description: Whether to include information about recent deployments, updates, or configuration changes
